summary: Bluetooth: use hdev->workqueue when queuing hdev->{cmd,ncmd}_timer works
details:
Bluetooth: use hdev->workqueue when queuing hdev->{cmd,ncmd}_timer works

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.1 by commit 3c6b036fe5c8ed8b6c4cbdc03605929882907ef0, it was introduced in version v6.0 by commit 877afadad2dce8aae1f2aad8ce47e072d4f6165e. For more details please see the references link.
